Package be.baur.sda.serialization

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Formatter
    A Formatter (in SDA context) is a serializer that converts an SDA document object to a character stream, in a format specific to the type of formatter.
    Parser
    A Parser (in SDA context) is a deserializer that reads an input stream (in a format specific to the type of parser) and creates an SDA document object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SDAFormatter
    This is the default formatter, which renders a Node (and any child nodes) as SDA content in a pretty - or at least human readable - way.
    SDAParser
    This is the default parser; used to read and parse SDA content into a Node.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SyntaxException
    Thrown by the SDAParser if the SDA syntax is violated.
